noteR.para: Before repairing the sealing, check the sealing of the zone concernedvehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

procedure.title: preparation operation for repairing the sealing
Check the position and adjust if necessary:

ul.li: the blanking covers,
the rear shock absorbersrear shock absorber: removal - refittingGIEMR-000053(33A, Rear axle components),
the sealing mastic.

procstep.para: NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing of the zoneunderbody : sealing checkGIEMR-002104.
Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.
NO: fault resolved.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the centre floor

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the centre floor sealing has been checked?
NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

ul.li: a) if the blanking covers of the centre floor are detached, refit the blanking covers of the centre floor,
b) if the blanking covers of the centre floor are deformed or cracked, replace the blanking covers of the centre floor,
c) if the sealing mastics of the centre floor are detached, faulty or incorrectly positioned, clean the faulty masticsbodywork cleaning tools : descriptionGIEMR-001618(05B, Equipment and tools),
apply extruded mastic and sprayed mastic to the cleaned zonesafter assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837(04F, Bodywork products and mountings).

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the centre floorunderbody : sealing checkGIEMR-002104.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the front wheel arch

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the front wheel arch sealing has been checked?
NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

ul.li: a) if the front wheel arch liner is incorrectly positioned, refit the front wheel arch linerfront wheel arch liner: removal - refittingGIEMR-002352(55A, Exterior protections),
b) if the front wheel arch liner is deformed or cracked, replace the front wheel arch linerfront wheel arch liner: removal - refittingGIEMR-002352(55A, Exterior protections),
c) if the blanking covers of the front wheel arch are detached, refit the blanking covers of the front wheel arch,
d) if the blanking covers of the front wheel arch are deformed or cracked, replace the blanking covers of the front wheel arch,
e) if the sealing mastics of the front wheel arch are detached, faulty or incorrectly positioned, clean the faulty masticsbodywork cleaning tools : descriptionGIEMR-001618(05B, Equipment and tools),
apply extruded mastic and sprayed mastic to the cleaned zonesafter assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837(04F, Bodywork products and mountings).

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the front wheel archunderbody : sealing checkGIEMR-002104.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the rear floor

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the bolted rear floor sealing has been checked?
NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

ul.li: a) if the rear floor mountings are loosened, tighten the rear floor mountings rear floor, rear section: replacementGIEMR-001775 (41D, Rear lower structure),

b) if the sealing mastic of the rear floor is faulty or incorrectly positioned, replace the sealing mastic of the rear floor rear floor, rear section: replacementGIEMR-001775 (41D, Rear lower structure).

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the welded rear floor sealing has been checked?
NO: move on to the next step.
YES:

ul.li: a) if the blanking covers of the rear floor are detached, refit the blanking covers of the rear floor,
b) if the blanking covers of the rear floor are deformed or cracked, replace the blanking covers of the rear floor.
c) if the sealing mastics of the rear floor are detached, faulty or incorrectly positioned, clean the faulty masticsbodywork cleaning tools : descriptionGIEMR-001618(05B, Equipment and tools),
apply extruded mastic and sprayed mastic to the cleaned zonesafter assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837(04F, Bodywork products and mountings).

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear floorunderbody : sealing checkGIEMR-002104.

procedure.title: Repairing the sealing of the rear wheel arch

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after the rear wheel arch sealing has been checked?
NO: fault resolved.
YES:

ul.li: a) if the rear wheel arch liner is incorrectly positioned, refit the rear wheel arch linerrear wheel arch liner: removal - refittingGIEMR-002350(55A, Exterior protections),
b) if the rear wheel arch liner is deformed or cracked, replace the rear wheel arch linerrear wheel arch liner: removal - refittingGIEMR-002350(55A, Exterior protections),
c) if the blanking covers of the rear wheel arch are detached, refit the blanking covers of the rear wheel arch,
d) if the blanking covers of the rear wheel arch are deformed or cracked, replace the blanking covers of the rear wheel arch,
e) if the sealing mastics of the rear wheel arch are detached, faulty or incorrectly positioned, clean the faulty masticsbodywork cleaning tools : descriptionGIEMR-001618(05B, Equipment and tools),
apply extruded mastic and sprayed mastic to the cleaned zonesafter assembly anti-corrosion protection : descriptionGIEMR-001837(04F, Bodywork products and mountings).

f) if the upper mounting of the shock absorber is incorrectly positioned, refit the upper sealing component of the shock absorber rear shock absorber: removal - refittingGIEMR-000053 (33A, Rear axle components).

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the rear wheel archunderbody : sealing checkGIEMR-002104.
